website_summaries.verdict: The low-profile structure of this teeth grinding device is ideal for anyone who prefers a less bulky guard. However, the trade-off may be a less secure fit for some.
pros: Stands out for its minimalist design that doesn't cover the front teeth
Firm material stands up to grinding while soft cushioning adds comfort
cons: Somewhat difficult to fit, which could result in it slipping out of place

customer_reviews.title: Cook it longer and it works great!
customer_reviews.text: When I followed the directions it did not work. I ended up putting it back in as the water was boiling and kept it in for 4-5 minutes. Than I followed the directions from there. It worked well and I find it a lot more comfortable to sleep with than others I have tired.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Very happy in general... one issue.
customer_reviews.text: It's easier to sleep with than my custom made mouth piece from my dentist.... I think it's because the front section of the guard is open. Note: It does take my mouth (or jaw?) a few minutes to return to its natural bite. First thing in the mornings I can't put my back teeth together... then 10-15 minute later I can. Maybe I did something wrong when molding the guard??? I am going to consult my dentist on my next visit.
customer_reviews.author: Don Collier

customer_reviews.title: Good for TMJ/TMD/TMJD symptoms
customer_reviews.text: Bought for someone with TMJD whose medical professional recommended it to try to avoid pursuing costly custom TMJ orthotics. She wears it most nights, and it has kept her jaw from coming out of place badly again. Twice it has put her jaw back in place overnight. (To clarify, her jaw has never fully dislocated or gotten stuck open/closed.) She highly recommends it when used along with seeing a medical professional.
customer_reviews.author: Elias W.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this night guard. I tried to get this to fit snugly over my teeth but it would pop off every time. Tried rewarming it, less pressure, more pressure... nothing helped. There is no way I could have slept with this in without keeping my jaw clenched the whole time. Which is the opposite of what it’s for. : (
customer_reviews.author: Mary K Bellamy

customer_reviews.title: It was not comfortable at all and just didn't fit right
customer_reviews.text: It was not comfortable at all and just didn't fit right. I have a small mouth and it felt too small for my teeth. I sent it back and they refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: BackToEarth

customer_reviews.title: not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: it’s too tight in the back of my teeth makes my jaw hurts ...
customer_reviews.author: Will Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I followed all directions precisely but it does not work. It sits more on top of my teeth rather than my teeth fitting into it. Quite uncomfortable. Would have been better to go to the dentist and apply this money toward one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Used once
customer_reviews.text: Not at all beneficial for my clinching and could never get a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best night guard I’ve had. I tried a different one in the past but rarely could I wear it as my jaw would hurt the following day. This night guard adds much more comfort and lasts significantly longer than my previous one. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Max Kim-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this dental guard won't fit my husband's mouth. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORST MOUTHGUARD EVER
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Followed instructions and once I was finally done with it the mouthguard simply slides of. NOT WORTH IT, SAVE YOURSELF THE MONEY AND DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Restrepo

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I could not use this product it did not work at all for me. I threw it out
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: More like child size
customer_reviews.text: Way to small. And I have a small mouth. More like child size.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Falk

customer_reviews.title: It was a waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: The Grind did not fit - I followed the instructions and still didn't work. It was a waste of my money. Wish I could get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 2 times with the boiling water to make this guard fit. I called customer service today per the instructions and there was no one around that had any knowledge of fitting this guard... I had the instructions in front of me and she said that they may be a bit misleading! What!!! No help what so ever! Very disappointing! I was told that I could try it a 3rd time with the boiling water and add 10 more seconds on...which I will now try. It's sad that you can't call a customer service # and talk with someone knowledgeable about their own product!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Contains BPA
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving the guard, it had a big sticker that said it contains BPA, a chemical known to cause reproductive harm in women. As such, I will return it and not use it. It would be nice if the product description indicated this.
customer_reviews.author: Brinn

customer_reviews.title: I clench and the hard plus soft part of this guard is wonderful. Highly recommend for those who clench so hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for me. I clench and the hard plus soft part of this guard is wonderful. Highly recommend for those who clench so hard you get headaches.
customer_reviews.author: MEJWESUT

customer_reviews.title: unique garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a one of a kind garbage, might as well wear a piece of wood strapped to your mouth. Uncomfortable doesn't even get close to describe the feeling you have when putting this s*t in your mouth. Truth be told you will not grind your teeth with this but not because it does anything rather because you won't be able to sleep with it. If you want to experience the horror feeling of having your mouth forcibly held open buy it, just be warned .
customer_reviews.author: bd

customer_reviews.title: Best Guard I have tried
customer_reviews.text: Because of the design with the smaller bridge in the front, I can breathe. The others were awful and I could not breathe and so sleep. I have been using these for a couple of years now and I love them. It works as advertised for me. I am medium build and it fits me great. I'm actually surprised about some of the negative reviews but I can only speak for myself. I'm glad I gave them a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Burchell

customer_reviews.title: eh. not super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Mostly comfortable. I do find that the wings on the sides dig into my gums
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Really, like product I just have to remember to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mahana

customer_reviews.title: Nice...while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Was nice while it lasted. Just over a month and the connecting strap snapped off of one side, effectively making it useless. I'll try another one but if it doesn't last longer I'll have to go back to a full-mouth model. Shame, since this one was actually pretty comfortable...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Grind Guard I Have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I have been a severe teeth grinder for many years. I wake up with jaw and neck pain and have even cracked several of my molars. I have tried every grind guard on the market only to have them fall our while I am sleeping, don't fit tight and I grind through them in a few weeks. The pain I get in my jaw from clenching is awful. The first night I wore the Oraguard I slept right through the night. I could not believe it. I had no pain, it stayed in and my husband said I didn't snore. I am going on 2 weeks and it has really helped me after all these years.
customer_reviews.author: jestforefun

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions as carefully as I could, but when I put it on the first night it moved around and slipped off. Not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marvela

customer_reviews.title: Choking Hazard
customer_reviews.text: I know how to use these at home kits. This is my third brand of night guard. But two molding sessions and melting the plastic again before bed didn’t help. Thankfully I must have spit it out overnight because it was in my sheets. Otherwise I would have choked to death.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: My dentist said I've been grinding my teeth for the last year and it was this option or an expensive custom one. The Ora-Guard dental grind guard is super comfortable. One thing that's different is that it only covers the back teeth, which is where the grinding takes place for me. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: ... several mouth guards over the years and I am happy to say Ora-Guard is the most effective and comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several mouth guards over the years and I am happy to say Ora-Guard is the most effective and comfortable for the money. I am now able to sleep through the night. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DTFannon

customer_reviews.title: I'm buying it again.  First one was over a year ago.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other products. They are either too big and I cannot breath, or so small that I'm afraid that I'm going to swallow them. I prefer to have it molded (boiling or microwave) so it "snaps" into place and stays there.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I am a dental hygienist with 40 years of experience. I bought this product to see if I could recommend it to patients if they wanted to try an OTC NG. Not worth the money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. Does not sit right in the mouth, even after following instructions to a T.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I actually use it for working out. I can talk drink water and protect my teeth. Bottomline if you train hard clenching your teeth is a natural part of the process; protect your teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob M.

customer_reviews.title: Contains Bisphenol-A!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. It contains Bisphenol-A. It is not shown anywhere here. The product itself has a small sticker showing that it contains it.
customer_reviews.author: ClosetFashionistaholic

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Not Prop 65 Compliant!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS MOUTH GUARD! It starts to shed small pieces off, if you are a teeth grinder, after a month of use. Most importantly, it is not Prop 65 compliant, which means it has cancer causing chemicals in it. Imagine exposing your mouth to that on a nightly basis and possibly ingesting the small plastic pieces that come off over time. Do not risk it
customer_reviews.author: P. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy that I was able to find Ora-GUARD! I was hesitant to buy online, but it ships really quick! I wear it over my Essex Retainer and it fits perfectly. I've woken up without a headache for the first time in years! I'm happy that I was able to get something that works great without having to spend $200+ at the dentist.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Mickelson

customer_reviews.title: The connecting part stuck out too far and rubbed against my gum so bad it made a sore
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. The connecting part stuck out too far and rubbed against my gum so bad it made a sore. It is so big it makes me gag. Of course you can't return it so there's $30 bucks down the drain. .
customer_reviews.author: SJC

customer_reviews.title: Best one so far
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my lower teeth. It’s nice and comfortable as much as a piece of plastic in my mouth can be.
customer_reviews.author: Pie

product_meta.title: Ora-Guard Dental Grind Guard
product_meta.description:
Ora-guard is a new take on dental grind guards and nighttime teeth protection. Most other products rely on “soft surface barriers” to keep teeth from grinding together at night. The problem is that this soft material doesn’t allow your teeth and jaws to move naturally, meaning you still end up with a sore tmj muscle in the morning. Worse yet, the soft material breaks down quickly under the intense pressure of heavy teeth grinding, meaning the life of these devices can be measured in weeks. Ora-guard uses soft, medical grade material to provide a cushion during clenching, but is built around a patented hard surface design that allows your teeth and jaws to slide down and forward naturally, protecting your teeth from the damaging effects of grinding and avoiding the “tension pain” in the tmj muscle.

NOTE: CONSUMERS WHO RESIDE IN THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA - The state of California mandates a Proposition 65 warning label on products that may contain ingredients that are listed on the Proposition 65 list. This requirement enables California residents to make informed purchase decisions based on this information. The Ora-GUARD is FDA cleared and is constructed of materials that have a long history of safe use in bruxism guards. To comply with California Proposition 65 regulations, a warning label is applied to the packaging which reads "Warning: This product contains BPA a chemical known to the state of California to cause reproductive harm in women."
feature_bullets: Patented bite plate wedge design slides lower jaw down and forward, relieving tension on tmj muscle
Low profile means no bulk and comfortable to wear, patented design ensures secure, no slip fit
Easy custom-like fit can be achieved by microwave, or traditional boiling water to fit
